reviews.review_msg: So.  Excellent lecturer. Extremely clear on the material to study.  I recommend trying to keep up with the readings because they are vital on the tests.  Stick to the key ideas and then go into detail.  Extremely tough grader, always getting TAs to lower grades, but overall really great class, interesting lecturer, and impressive German impressions

Stuart Parker has lost the entire classes papers, perhaps on a train, but more likely has forgotten to mark them.  EXTREMELY knowledgeable on the subject, so questions will likely be answered, but is too all over the place to be at all helpful in preparing for the final exam.  If you take this class, best of luck.  I pray for your dear, dear soul.
